adm:managed-object.name: profiler-plugin
adm:managed-object.adm:synopsis:
The
is used to capture profiling information about operations performed inside the JVM while the Directory Server is running.

adm:property.name: profile-sample-interval
adm:property.adm:description: Specifies the sample interval that should be used when capturing profiling information in the server. Changes to this configuration attribute will take effect the next time the profiler is started.

adm:property.name: profile-directory
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Specifies the directory for writing profile information.
adm:property.adm:description: Specifies the path to the directory into which profile information will be written. The directory must exist and the Directory Server must have permission to create new files in it. Changes to this configuration attribute will take effect immediately.

adm:property.name: enable-profiling-on-startup
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Indicates whether to automatically begin capturing profile data when the server is started.
adm:property.adm:description: Indicates whether the profiler plugin should start collecting data automatically when the Directory Server is started. This will only be read when the server is started, and any changes will take effect on the next restart.

adm:property.name: profile-action
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Specifies the action that should be taken by the profiler.
adm:property.adm:description: Specifies the action that should be taken by the profiler. A value of "start" will cause the profiler thread to start collecting data if it is not already active. A value of "stop" will cause the profiler thread to stop collecting data and write it do disk, and a value of "cancel" will cause the profiler thread to stop collecting data and discard anything that has been captured. These operations will occur immediately.

adm:value.name: stop
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Stop collecting profile data and write what has been captured to a file in the profile directory.

adm:value.name: cancel
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Stop collecting profile data and discard what has been captured.
